meanings.definition: Land covered with grass or other plants suitable for grazing animals.
meanings.sent1: The cows happily roamed the vast pasturelands.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use pasturelands to feed their animals.
meanings.sent3: The sheep decided to have a dance party in the pasturelands.
meanings.sent4: The pasturelands stretched out like a green carpet under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the pasturelands filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: An area of land used for grazing livestock.
meanings.sent1: The horses galloped freely in the open pasturelands.
meanings.sent2: Shepherd dogs help guide the sheep in the pasturelands.
meanings.sent3: The pasturelands became a popular spot for picnics among the cows.
meanings.sent4: The pasturelands were a buffet for the hungry cattle.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful beauty of the pasturelands was a sight to behold.
